summary: A high caste Brahmin household adopts an orphaned lower caste girl, but when a young man from their caste wishes to marry her without knowing her lineage, caste differences flare up again.
cast: Nutan|Sunil Dutt|Shashikala|Lalita Pawar|Tarun Bose|Sulochana Latkar|Asit Kumar Sen|Ashim Kumar|Paul Mahendra|Baij Sharma|Brahm Bhardwaj|Moni Chatterjee|Sabitri Devi|Shivji Bhai|Sailen Bose|Madhup Sharma|Sanghvi|Master Sohni|Baby Farida|Baby Shobha|Sona Mastan Mirza
title: Sujata
